revised_title: Anatomical Study and Classification of Macgillivrayia pelagica and Cheletropis Huxleyi
tldr: The author examines the anatomy of Macgillivrayia pelagica and Cheletropis Huxleyi, two species of pelagic Gasteropoda, and suggests the establishment of a new order within the Gasteropoda based on their distinct respiratory organs and shell formations.
